MESSAGES.SUCCESS: Your email has been confirmed successfully.
MESSAGES.INVALID_OR_EXPIRED: The verification code is invalid or has expired. Please try again or request a new one.
MESSAGES.USER_NOT_FOUND: We couldn’t find your account. Please sign up again.
MESSAGES.ALREADY_VERIFIED: Your email is already confirmed. You can sign in directly.
MESSAGES.UPDATE_FAILED: We couldn’t verify your email due to a system issue. Please try again later.

MESSAGES.RESEND_SUCCESS_OTP: A new verification code has been sent to your email. Please check your inbox.

MESSAGES.RESEND_FAILURE: We couldn’t resend the confirmation email. Please try again later.
MESSAGES.BLOCKED: We couldn’t verify your registration. Please sign in again.

footer.achieveyourbusiness: and achieve your business goals with confidence

hero.title3: Professionals for Any Service – From Taxes to Home Needs
hero.description: Fast, secure, and reliable bookings for individuals and businesses.

how-it-works.description: Our streamlined process makes getting professional tax and business services simple and stress-free

step1.title: Select Your Service
step1.description: Choose from our comprehensive range of tax and business services

step2.title: Provide Documents/Info
step2.description: Securely upload your documents or provide necessary information

step3.title: Expert Processing
step3.description: Our licensed professionals handle your tax or business work

step4.title: Review & Complete
step4.description: Review your completed work and file or launch your business

testimonials.description: Don't just take our word for it - hear from satisfied clients who trust us with their financial needs

all-services.subtitle: Explore our tax and business solutions designed to make things easier for you.

complete-profile.title: Complete Your Profile
